summary: Website UI enhancements: add a global animated neon/glow background effect and implement a functional sidebar close (X) button with a slide-out close animation.
architectural_notes: Add global neon/glow background animation as a site-wide effect (e.g., via CSS/Canvas) with configurable intensity/performance considerations.
Sidebar close interaction should animate (slide-out) before hiding/unmounting the sidebar. Direction (left vs right) needs confirmation.
known_issues: Sidebar slide-out direction is ambiguous (user answered 'yes' to left/right); requires clarification to ensure correct behavior.

existing_features.title: Apply a global animated neon/glow background effect across the entire website (all routes), not just within specific panels, while keeping all UI content interactive (no blocking pointer events) and ensuring legible contrast for text/icons.

Add a visible, functional close (X) button to the sidebar drawer UI so users can close it reliably; clicking the X must close the sidebar and trigger a slide-out close animation in the same direction the sidebar opens (e.g., left sidebar slides out left; right sidebar slides out right).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add global animated neon/glow background effect across the entire website
Implement working sidebar close (X) button that triggers a slide-out close animation

projectName: Global neon/glow animated background + working sidebar close (X) with slide-out animation
